objective1.question: Which of the following is handbrake?
objective1.hint: Handbrake is the one you should push up before leaving the car.
feedback: Incorrect. It is a rearview mirror.
Incorrect. It is a brake pedal.

objective1.question: What light you should use when driving on the road in city at night?
objective1.hint: On city road, it is usually with lights by the side.
feedback: Incorrect. Full-beam headlamps can disturb the sight of other drivers near you.

objective2.question: When the parking place is at left behind your car, which side should your steering wheel turn to?
objective2.hint: Recall how you turn your steering wheel when reversing.
feedback: Incorrect. Your car will go back-right.
